page.title: 01South of Launceston
page.content: This is mainly an agricultural area,concentrating on dairy farming.There are 2 industrial areas Pennygillam and Scarne,which produce a large range of products.In this area there is a leisure centre, a police station,and a primary school. There is also a large secondary school and 2 hospitals.Lawhitton is a village to the south. It is small and rural with 2 modern housing estates.There is an ancient church there .To the south of Lawhitton there is a hamlet called Hexworthy which consists of about 10 houses centred on 2 farms. There is also a rural studies museum at Tremeale which houses both machinery and some animals.The feel of the area is predominently rural.
